extendedInfo.description: The new ESPN College Football App is the ultimate, year-round companion for every college football fan.  Follow the nation's top stories with unprecedented coverage and watch in-progress highlights as big plays happen.  Get breaking news and scoring alerts for your favorite teamsâ and follow any game you care about with customizable scoreboards.Features:â¢ In-progress video alerts of the biggest plays pushed right to you moments after they happen.â¢ Easy access to live games on WatchESPNâ¢ Personalized My Games scoreboard featuring any college football game you care aboutâ¢ Comprehensive editorial coverage featuring game previews, recaps, analysis and highlights.â¢ Signature ESPN analysis videos from our college football team plus exclusive clips from College GameDay, ESPNU and moreâ¢ Be the expert with College GameDay voting, video features and matchup breakdowns.â¢ Team by team Twitter content and discussions.â¢ Breaking news alerts, scoring alerts, potential upsets and video highlights and analysis alertsâ¢ Bowl Bound section with weekly projections from Brad Edwards for every bowl gameâ¢ Team alerts for all 124 FBS schoolsâ

reviews.title: Not compatible with Galaxy S4 Android 4.2.2
reviews.comment: Wow.... really ESPN? I tried to download to my new Galaxy S4, and it tells me it\'s not compatible. Hope you fix it soon!!!
reviews.author: Ron Wozny

reviews.title: No alerts
reviews.comment: On my GS3 alerts worked great. Now on my Nexus 4 the alerts do not work at all and everything is setup the same as my GS3. Please fix.
reviews.author: Charles Caragan

reviews.title: Once great app...
reviews.comment: Video highlights no longer work which is my main reason for having this app. Screen goes blank when I attempt to play video. This was my one source of highlights. Uninstalling today.
reviews.author: Christopher Ikechukwu Eyidah

reviews.title: Charge for it
reviews.comment: Give a full purchase option. All the in game ads and credits system ruin the experience. I\'ll Desinstall for now.
reviews.author: Yanick Delafoge

reviews.title: Cool cool app
reviews.comment: Luv tis app. One of da only apps I know dat has all da info u need into 1, I mean recruiting, team news, team rankings,recruiting rankings, u name it & it has it. Luv it
reviews.author: Barry Duncan

reviews.title: Update was a downgrade
reviews.comment: This app used to be great. After the latest update I can no longer access my team pages and can\'t read any articles because I\'m not an \"insider\". ESPN is getting to where they are all about the money.
reviews.author: Robert Brown

reviews.title: Terrible Version This Year
reviews.comment: Force closes a lot. Has the dates wrong for at least 50% of first week games. Blogs aren\'t working correctly. I loved the Bowl Bound they had the past two years. Very unimpressive ESPN. Please make it more like last year\'s Bowl Bound.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Would have given 5 stars if it only had a schedule too I mean it has everything else why no schedule ?
reviews.author: kevin parker

reviews.title: Needs an update
reviews.comment: Since the start of the seasons alerts have not been working. Also would be nice if game cast was part of the app not a website redirect. Needs to be more like the sport center app
reviews.author: Nick Mullican

reviews.title: Problem needs fixed
reviews.comment: Force closes a lot. Almost every article you have to pay for. They aren\'t that good so why would I pay for them? Pretty pointless since you have to pay for everything
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SERIOUSLY?!?!
reviews.comment: This app is not compatible with my new Nexus 10 tablet. Also, this app broke a long time ago on my Galaxy Nexus. How is your app not supported by the newest devices on the latest OS version? Get your act together ESPN.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ESPN asleep?
reviews.comment: App. still not compatible with the Galaxy S4? Really ESPN? Wake up!!
reviews.author: Alex T.

reviews.title: Super sophisticated & cutting edge!
reviews.comment: Love, love, LOVE this app! Even in the off season, I get the most interesting news about college football!
reviews.author: Jennifer Robinette

reviews.title: So Far So Good
reviews.comment: I have the Galaxy Note 2 and so far everything is perfect!!! WORKS VERY WELL!!!!!!
reviews.author: Rico Smooth

reviews.title: Not compatible with Samsung Galaxy products?
reviews.comment: I\'m with Ron, REALLY! I have the Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 & been waiting for this app to be compatible with my Note since I bought it. I have this app on my HTC EVO 4G LTE & I love it. But come on ESPN! Are there any plans for an update????
reviews.author: Randy Ball

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: After signing in, there\'s just a blank screen with \"Signed in as [name]\", then \"sign out\" underlined in blue, and at the bottom, \"Continue without signing in\". Nothing happens.
reviews.author: Ben Frey

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Discussion boards being taken away from this app makes it a lot less entertaining. And then when you add the fact that most of the interesting articles on this app require you to be and insider subscriber it\'s really kind of useless. bring back the discussion boards and stop trying to charge people to read stories! And maybe this app will get back to its former glory.
reviews.author: Shamah Brant

reviews.title: Not Acceptable!!
reviews.comment: Was a pretty good app until they decided to make 90 % of the articles requiring insider access. Why would anyone want to pay for this info when it\'s available elsewhere for free. ESPN is getting way to greedy.
reviews.author: Eric Jarvis

reviews.title: Really ESPN?
reviews.comment: No 7 inch tablet support. It is only one of the most popular form factors in the market today.
reviews.author: Corey Hedberg

reviews.title: No video
reviews.comment: Everything else works fine. Just can\'t seem to get video. Stays on loading screen forever.
reviews.author: A Google User
